text:
This feature requires modifing the log4j.dtd to add (param*) to renderer, returning the created
ObjectRender class from RendererMap.addRenderer, and then adding bit or parameter parsing 
and PropertySetting to DOMConfigurator.parseRenderer

I copied the code for parameter parsing and property setting out of another parse method to get
things working.  (first attachment  ParameterizedRenderers.patch)

Then I refactored out similiar parameter parsing and PropertySetting code in parseFilters,
parseRenderers, and parsePlugins into setParameters. (second attachment
ParameterizedRenderersWithSetParametersExtractMethod.patch)

This seems like unnecessary bloat for the log4j core.  If other committers 
disagree, they can reopen this issue and/or they (or the OP) can bring this up 
on the log4j-dev list.
creator: yoavs@computer.org
